body: I don't think we should do it this way.  We had a ton of magic mapping from "optional" devices to CPU before we started using optional and it just led to bugs, confusion, etc.  The error linked can also be easily worked around and shouldn't have a transitive effect given it's inside a .cu file, where you probably don't have (non-cuda) derived DeviceGuards.
